entry.title: Low tech and high tech communication - eTech Ohio 2008
entry.summary: [![The audience #4][]][]At the eTech Ohio Technology Conference this past February I presented on different ways a person can communicate. entry.content:
[![The audience #4][]][]At the eTech Ohio Technology Conference this past February I presented on different ways a person can communicate. Some ways were very low tech (writing a letter, using the phone), and some ways very high tech (using Grand Central to control incoming calls, social networking with del.icio.us or Twitter). I've finally gotten around to tagging the sites in del.icio.us (thanks Alvin!). I used the tag etechohio08.
[][] photo credit: steveyb

[![The audience #4][]]: http://www.flickr.com/photos/48889119834@N01/2333117533/ "The audience #4" []: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.0/ "Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike License"
